abstract: Shares in BHP Billiton rose as much as 2.4 percent on Friday, bucking the trend in a broadly falling stock market, following a report that Rio Tinto was considering a counterbid for its BHP.
lead_paragraph: Shares in BHP Billiton rose as much as 2.4 percent on Friday, bucking the trend in a broadly falling stock market, following a report that Rio Tinto was considering a counterbid for its BHP.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Said to Mull Pac-Man Defense Against BHP
